name: 人間昆虫 ～覗き～
summary: When the guy was a child, he killed a lot of insects, about 100 a day. Now, as their revenge, he got turned into insects and has to live as a mantis, bee, spider and beetle. Will he ever be able to return to human form? He will never view insects the same way again.
info:
• 平台: MAC OS
  • 平台: PC98
  • 平台: WIN95
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1997-02-21
  • 售价: 7800円
